display_long_description:
# **Hatch-Pot VR: Immerse Yourself in the World of Anime**

Hatch-Pot VR is a next-generation entertainment app that lets you experience popular Japanese anime as “VR anime.” Step into a 360-degree VR space where you can feel like you’re inside the story.

## Key Features
- **VR Anime**: Enjoy your favorite anime like never before, now in VR! New anime titles will be added regularly, expanding your world of VR anime experiences.
- **Virtual Figures**: Collect high-quality 3D models of your favorite characters. Decorate your personal VR space and make it uniquely yours.
- **Virtual Dioramas**: Recreate iconic scenes and freely arrange characters in your VR environment. Even more customization options are planned for future updates!
- **Free to Start + DLC**: The base app is free to download, with additional content available through DLC.
- **First DLC: *Hinabita♪ VR Anime***: Enjoy KONAMI’s beloved “Hinabita♪” as a VR anime experience. Immerse yourself in the world and story of this unique series in 360-degree VR.

---

Hatch-Pot VR is evolving with each update, and your feedback and support are essential in helping us create new, exciting experiences. Join us in expanding the world of Hatch-Pot VR as we bring in more anime titles and grow together with the community. Download now and help us shape the future of VR anime!

※This collaboration content was produced by D'Arts, Inc. using the rights licensed under an agreement with Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd.
